description:
On an errand to the Sea Dragon Shrine, Ikuto meets Machi, Ayane`s older sister. Ayane has run off, so she tasks Ikuto and Suzu with finding her in exchange for a huge batch of Suzu`s favorite sweets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Run and Escape, Onee-sama / Be Surprised, Evil Spirit
にげてのがれて, お姉様 / おどろいて, 悪霊
